HTTPretty’s - HTTP Client Mocking for Python¶

HTTP Client mocking tool for Python. Provides a full fake TCP socket module. Inspired by FakeWeb

Looking for the Github Repository ?

Python Support:

  • 2.7.13
  • 3.6.5
  • 3.7.0
